name: Lasso-Loop Whiplash WebGL
description:
You're a horse minding your own business when the sheriff caught you in his lasso. Show him who's boss by smacking him into as many different objects as possible!

This game was made for Ludum Dare 47 under the theme "Stuck in a Loop".

Go to https://adiwan.itch.io/lasso-loop-whiplash for downloading the executables that offer you the better experience.

The HTML5 export has minor graphical glitches in a lot of places, however the game does work.
